code: @Override protected JndiRegistry createRegistry() throws Exception {     SimpleSearchTerm mySearchTerm = new SimpleSearchTerm().     mySearchTerm.setSubjectOrBody("Camel").     JndiRegistry jndi = super.createRegistry().     jndi.bind("mySearchTerm", mySearchTerm).     return jndi. }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from("pop3://bill@localhost?password=secret&searchTerm=#mySearchTerm").to("mock:result").         }     }. }
